item.description: Code of conduct The Quick Version SnowCamp is dedicated to providing a harassment-free conference experience for everyone, regardless of gender, gender identity and expression, age, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or technology choices. We do not tolerate harassment of conference participants in any form. Sexual language and imagery is not appropriate for any conference venue, including talks, workshops, parties, Twitter and other online media.

Organisation Snowcamp is a conference crafted by developers from the Grenoble area. It was started in 2016 on the initiative of AlpesJug. All organizers are enthusiast geeky volonteers. Cédric Tran-Xuan Johan Martinsson Lorie Pisicchio Ludovic Poitou Michel Barret Miguel Moquillon Pierrick Rassat Rémy Sanlaville Sébastien Chassande-Barrioz Yannick Chiron Yohan Lasorsa

2019 How was 2019? Great with wonderful subjects! In 2019, SnowCamp focused on 4 themes: Discovery, Web & DevOps / Cloud, Languages & Paradigmes and IA / Machine Learning. You can find the agenda and some slides here! Sponsors 2019 Without them, nothing would have been possible. A big thank you to our sponsors 2019!

Snowcamp The conference driving you (wal)nuts What is SnowCamp? First and foremost, it's a high-level technical conference that focuses on innovation. SnowCamp brings IT professionals and researchers together to discuss today's and tomorrow’s technologies. SnowCamp is a unique concept: day-long workshops on Wednesday, to learn or improve a certain technology; a more classical conference on Thursday and Friday, with the bonus of allowing participants to discover research projects through 5 minutes pitches; a socializing and relaxing day on the snow, in the mountains, on Saturday.

Become a sponsor Snowcamp is organized by a group of geeky volonteers. Their only motivation is to propose a unique conference gathering innovation and research. To make a success of this adventure, we need you. In return, we offer you a large visibility, on the web and during the event. It's the perfect opportunity to meet developers from Grenoble, demonstrate your products and services, and to make yourself known.

Tickets You can buy a pack of 3 days (universities + conferences), or 2 days (conferences only). The tickets can be bought through our partner YouPlan. Beware, the number of attendees is limited and we were sold out last year! The store is not open yet Early Birds - Package 3 days 150 € 100 € Universities + Conferences Access to the Universities Access to the Conferences Breakfast for the 3 days Lunch for the 3 days Meet & Greet on Thursday evening The store is not open yet Early Birds - Package 2 days 60 € 42 € Conferences only
